reviews.review: Great professor who explains concepts very clearly and is always available for extra help.
reviews.subject: Math

reviews.review: Knowledgeable but can be a bit unorganized in lectures. Overall, a good experience.
reviews.subject: Physics

reviews.review: Very tough grader, but you will learn a lot if you put in the effort.
reviews.subject: Computer Science

reviews.review: Engaging and interactive classes. Always encourages student participation.
reviews.subject: Literature

reviews.review: The professor is knowledgeable but the lectures can be dry. Would recommend for independent learners.
reviews.subject: Chemistry

reviews.review: Very friendly and approachable, but sometimes the lectures lack depth.
reviews.subject: Biology

reviews.review: Excellent at breaking down complex topics. Exams are tough but fair.
reviews.subject: Economics

reviews.review: Incredible enthusiasm and passion for the subject. Assignments are challenging but rewarding.
reviews.subject: History

reviews.review: Doesn't provide much feedback on assignments. The lectures can be monotonous.
reviews.subject: Sociology

reviews.review: Very clear and concise in explanations, but sometimes moves too quickly through material.
reviews.subject: Philosophy

reviews.review: Great energy in class and really makes the subject matter interesting.
reviews.subject: Psychology

reviews.review: The lectures are engaging, but the grading is strict. Be prepared to work hard.
reviews.subject: Law

reviews.review: Good professor, but the course materials could be better organized.
reviews.subject: Political Science

reviews.review: Always provides real-world examples which makes the class very interesting.
reviews.subject: Business Administration

reviews.review: A bit hard to follow at times, but very knowledgeable.
reviews.subject: Statistics

reviews.review: Very helpful during office hours, and the lectures are well-structured.
reviews.subject: Engineering

reviews.review: Encourages creativity and independent thinking. A great class to take if you're interested in the subject.
reviews.subject: Art

reviews.review: Lectures are often confusing, but the professor is approachable for extra help.
reviews.subject: Environmental Science

reviews.review: Uses a lot of multimedia in the lectures, which makes learning more engaging.
reviews.subject: Media Studies

reviews.review: Challenging exams, but fair. The lectures are very informative.
